# GigProof

## Overview
GigProof is a Chrome extension and web app that helps gig workers generate a personal income summary PDF from earnings visible on Uber and DoorDash dashboards. The PDF is generated client-side and includes compliance language stating it is user-generated and not verified.

## Key Pages
- https://gigproof.online/
- https://gigproof.online/login
- https://gigproof.online/dashboard
- https://gigproof.online/download
- https://gigproof.online/pricing
- https://gigproof.online/faq
- https://gigproof.online/contact
- https://gigproof.online/for-lenders
- https://gigproof.online/merge
- https://gigproof.online/privacy
- https://gigproof.online/terms
- https://gigproof.online/security
- https://gigproof.online/cookies

## Product Summary
- Chrome extension extracts earnings data from user-visible dashboard pages.
- No bank access, no credential storage, no server-side PDF generation in MVP.
- Reports are user-generated summaries intended for informational use.
- Supported platforms: Uber, DoorDash, Lyft, Grubhub, Instacart, Amazon Flex, Shipt, Gopuff, Deliveroo, and Just Eat (driver/courier dashboards).

## Support
- Contact: https://gigproof.online/contact
